title: Software Engineer, Frontend - Mercari/リコマース領域新規事業
description:
JD in Japanese follows. 英文の後に和文JDをご覧いただけます。

Introduction

Circulate all forms of value to unleash the potential in all people

"What can I do to help society thrive with the finite resources we have?" The Mercari marketplace app was born in 2013 out of this thought by our founder Shintaro Yamada as he traveled the world. We believe that by circulating all forms of value, not just physical things and money, we can create opportunities for anyone to realize their dreams and contribute to society and the people around them. Mercari aims to use technology to connect people all over the world and create a world where anyone can unleash their potential.For more information about Mercari Group’s mission, see Mercari's Culture Doc.

Equal Opportunity Hiring

Here at Mercari, we work to realize a world in which no one’s potential is limited by their background and everyone has the opportunity to freely create value. We also firmly believe that a mindset of Diversity & Inclusion is essential... for us to achieve our mission.

This, of course, extends to our hiring practices as well. Mercari is committed to eliminating discrimination based on age, gender, sexual orientation, race, religion, physical disability, and other such factors so that anyone who shares our mission and values can join us, regardless of their background. For more details, please read our D&I Statement.

Team’s Mission / Work Responsibilities
• Mercari is preparing to launch a new business as its next step to enhance the creation of a circular economy.
• The team in charge of this new business is working to create a resale service platform that anyone, both individuals and businesses, can easily use. By creating a system to recirculate the 43.7 trillion yen worth of “hidden assets”1 in Japan, we hope to further expand Japan’s secondhand market, which is currently estimated to be 3 trillion yen.
• In concrete terms, our business consists of making the reusing of items the norm by breaking down the borders between online and offline and between primary and secondary distribution. This marks the first time Mercari has taken on such a challenge, and it contains a lot of hidden potential.
• (Learn more about Mercari's mission and values here.)
• The value of “hidden assets” is defined as the quantity of unneeded items sitting in households in Japan (as found in a survey) converted to Japanese yen using the average value of transactions on Mercari. “Unneeded items” is defined as items that have not been used for at least one year, but remain in the household for no particular reason

Specific work responsibilities include the following:
• Lead the launch of a new platform for the Recommerce area.
• Select the technologies and create the system architecture and specifications necessary to develop a new platform.
• Design and implement a web frontend that uses various kinds of frameworks such as TypeScript and React.

Unique and Bold Challenges
• Our business is directly linked to Mercari Group’s mission of “circulate all forms of value to unleash the potential in all people.”
• As this is a new business and team made up of a select few, you will be expected to take on a broad range of responsibilities.
• In your role, you’ll work on developing a new platform for promoting secondary distribution, and be involved in various decision-making in the 0 > 1 phase of our business. We’re therefore looking for someone who will go beyond simply using and expanding Mercari’s existing systems.　

Required Qualifications
• Shared belief in the mission and values of Mercari Group and its various companies
• Ability to work flexibly and independently in a constantly evolving environment
• Experience selecting middleware and designing software architecture
• Ability to take ownership and lead the software development process
• Knowledge of and experience in web application development
• Basic knowledge of performance, accessibility, and security
• Conceptual understanding of version management and development experience using Git
• Knowledge of TypeScript and development experience working with UI libraries or frameworks such as React, Vue.js, and Angular
• Skills for understanding and providing basic explanations of web operation principles and browsers　

Preferred Qualifications
• Experience establishing new services and tackling the challenges in the growth phase of a service
• Experience leading or managing developers and experience improving the development process
• Extensive knowledge of standard web technologies and specialized knowledge in some areas
• Understanding of the characteristics of different libraries/frameworks and the ability to advance their introduction to projects where necessary
• Experience of architecture design based on the characteristics of an application
• Experience of consistently taking initiative in implementing improvements to an application
• Basic knowledge of GraphQL

Screening Criteria
• Shares our belief in the mission and values of Mercari Group and its various companies
• Has leadership ability, flexibility, and agility
• Takes ownership of their work and puts forth maximum effort
• Able to find joy in the unknown and focus on the “cans” rather than the “cannots”
• Has a passion for creating new business
• Able to share the sentiment of Mercari Group that “everyone is a software engineer”

　(See this page for details.)

Key Points for Technical Assignments
• Rather than testing the depth of your knowledge of unique technologies or frameworks, the system design interview will check your overall ability to define the issue in front of you and see how, through your thought process, you come to a solution while communicating with your team members.
• Specifically, we will check the following points:
• How effectively do you communicate with the interviewer?
• If there are any system requirements that you do not know, are you able to ask questions and reach an accurate understanding?
• How do you work to resolve a problem that has no single correct answer?
• How do you make considerations for scalability and availability?
• If solving a problem results in a tradeoff, how do you approach decision-making?
• What sort of thought process do you go through to improve on ideas?
• Do you have a grasp of what system problems and improvements there are?

Language Requirements
• English：Independent (CEFR - B2) optional
• Japanese：Proficient (CEFR - C1) preferred
• Click here for more information about CEFR.

Related Articles
• Eight Keywords for Delving Into Mercari: Our First 10 Years and the Potential and Future We Seek to Unleash / The Seventh Keyword: “Our Connection to Society”
• Shintaro Yamada on Mercari’s 10th Anniversary and Its Past and Future: “There is still a lot I want to do, and I’m excited for what’s to come” | DIAMOND SIGNAL (only available in Japanese)
• Transcript: All About Our Product Development System—What Is “Everyone Is a Software Engineer”? (only available in Japanese)

Working Conditions

Employment Status

Full-time
• Probationary period: First 3 months after joining the company. (During this period your contract conditions will be the same as that of a permanent employee.)

Office

Roppongi
• Smoking is prohibited within our offices
• Mercari has introduced a work style policy called “Your Choice.” Each member is free to choose whether they want to work in the office or work fully remote. *Exceptions made for certain kinds of work.

Work Hours
• Full flextime (no “core time” or “flex time”)
• Does not apply to all positions

Holidays
• Two days off per week (as well as national holidays, New Year's break, etc.)
• Paid leave, congratulatory and bereavement leave, relax days, sick leave

Salary
• Annual salary paid in 12 monthly installments (including fixed overtime allowance)
• Based on skills, experience, and abilities
• Reviewed twice a year

Benefits
• Complete health and social insurance
• Incentive program
• Support systems, including those that benefit the employee’s family members
• See this page for details.

Support
• Relocation support
• Language learning support
• Translation/interpretation support
• See this page for details.

Media

Corporate Sites
• Mercari, Inc.
• Merpay, Inc. [Japanese]
• Souzoh, Inc.
• Mercoin, Inc.
• Mercari US

Owned Media
• Mercari Careers
• Mercari Engineering Portal
• Mercan - Introduces the people that make Mercari
• Mercari US Careers
• Mercari US Blog

はじめに

あらゆる価値を循環させ、あらゆる人の可能性を広げる

「地球資源が限られているなか、より豊かな社会をつくるために何ができるか」。2013年、創業者の山田進太郎が世界一周の旅で抱いた課題意識から、フリマアプリ「メルカリ」は生まれました。私たちは、物理的なモノやお金に限らずあらゆる価値を循環させることで、誰もがやりたいことを実現し、人や社会に貢献するための選択肢を増やすことができると信じています。

テクノロジーの力で世界中の人々をつなぎ、あらゆる人の可能性が発揮される世界を実現していきます。メルカリグループの目指すべき方針についてはMercari Culture Docをご覧ください。

選考における機会の平等

メルカリでは、バックグラウンドによって個人の可能性が決めつけられることなく、自由に価値を生みだす機会を手にできる社会の実現を目指しています。そしてメルカリがミッションを実現するために「Diversity & Inclusion」という考え方は不可欠な存在だと考えています。

採用活動においても、メルカリのミッション・バリューに共感する、様々なバックグラウンドの方にジョインしていただけるよう、年齢、性別、性的指向、人種、宗教、身体能力、その他記号に基づくあらゆる差別をなくすことを約束します。詳しくはD&I statementをご覧ください。

募集要項

チームのミッション / 業務内容
• メルカリでは、循環型社会の実現に向けた新たなチャレンジとして、新規事業の立ち上げを準備しています。
• 新規事業チームは、あらゆる個人、あらゆる事業者が、誰でもかんたんに利用できる、Resale Serviceのプラットフォームを構築し、43.7兆円ある日本の「かくれ資産」を再流通させる仕組みを作ることを通じて、現在3兆円規模の日本のリユース市場をさらに拡大していくことを目指しています。
• 具体的には、オンラインとオフライン、一次流通と二次流通の垣根を超えて、リユースをもっと身近で当たり前の営みにしていく事業となります。メルカリとして初めての取り組みであり、多くのポテンシャルが秘められています。

※メルカリのミッション・バリューについての詳細はこちらをご覧ください
※ “かくれ資産”とは、1年以上使用しておらず、理由なく家庭内に保管しているモノを不要品とし、不要品保管数量調査および「メルカリ」の平均取引価格により不要品を金額に換算した数値と定義しています。

具体的な業務内容は下記です。
• Recommerce領域の新規プラットフォームの立ち上げのリード
• 新規プラットフォーム開発のための技術選定 / システムアーキテクチャの構築 / 仕様作成
• TypeScriptとReactなどの各種フレームワークを使ったWeb Frontendの設計 / 実装

ユニークなチャレンジ
• メルカリの「あらゆる価値を循環させ、あらゆる人の可能性を広げる」というグループミッションに直結するビジネスです。
• 少数精鋭で立ち上げる新規事業チームのため、事業立ち上げに向けた横断的な役割が求められます。
• 既存のメルカリのシステムを活用・拡張するだけでなく、二次流通を促進させるための新規のプラットフォームを開発していくため、0→1のフェ��ズで様々な意思決定に関わることができます。

必須条件
• メルカリグループおよび各カンパニーのミッションとバリューに共感していただける
• 不確実性の高い環境であっても柔軟かつ自律的に開発に取り組む力
• ソフトウェアアーキテクチャの設計とミドルウェア選定の経験
• オーナーシップを持ってソフトウェアの開発を進める力
• Webアプリケーション開発の知識と経験
• パフォーマンス・アクセシビリティ・セキュリティに関する基本的な知識
• バージョン管理の概念への理解と、Git を用いた開発経験
• TypeScript に関する知識と、React・Vue.js・Angular といった何らかの UI ライブラリやフレームワークを用いた開発経験
• Web の動作原理やブラウザに関する理解と、基本的な説明スキル　

歓迎条件
• 新規サービスの立ち上げやサービスの成長期におけるチャレンジの経験
• 開発者のリードやマネジメント、プロセス改善の経験
• Web 標準技術に関する深い知識と、なんらかの得意分野
• ライブラリやフレームワークの特性への理解と、プロジェクト導入を適切に進める力
• アプリケーションの特性に応じたアーキテクチャの設計経験
• アプリケーションの改善を、自発的かつ継続的に実施した経験
• GraphQLに対する基本的な知識

選考のポイント
• メルカリグループおよび各カンパニーのミッションとバリューに共感できるか
• 率先力、柔軟性、スピード力があるか
• 担当の仕事に対して責任感を持ち、最大限の努力ができるか
• 曖昧で不確実な状況を楽しみ、「できない理由」ではなく「できる方法」を考えられるか
• 新規事業への高い熱量を持っているか
• メルカリグループの「全員ソフトウェアエンジニア」という考え方に対して共感できるか

※詳しくはこちらのページをご覧ください。

技術課題のポイント
• System Design Interviewを行い、特定の技術やフレームワークに対する深い知識よりも、直面する課題をどう定義し、どのような思考を経て、チームメンバーとどうコミュニケーションしながら解決に導くかといった総合的な能力をチェックします。
• 具体的には以下のポイントをチェックします。
• 面接官とどのようなコミュニケーションを行うか
• システムの要件への不明点があれば質問をし、正しく認識できるか
• 正解のない問題への解決にどのように取り組むか
• スケーラビリティーと可用性をどう考慮するか
• 問題解決にトレードオフが発生した場合にどのような意思決定をするか
• どのような思考プロセスを経てアイディアを改善するか
• システムの問題点や改善点を把握しているか

語学力
• 英語：Independent (CEFR - B2) 歓迎
• 日本語：Proficient (CEFR - C1) 必須
※ CEFRの詳細については、こちらをご覧ください

関連記事
• 【8つのキーワードからひもとく】メルカリの10年、そしてUnleashする可能性と未来──第7回「社会との接続」
• 創業10年を迎えたメルカリ・山田氏が語る過去と未来──「まだ満足はしていない、これからが楽しみ」 | DIAMOND SIGNAL
• 【書き起こし】プロダクト開発体制を一挙公開 – 全員ソフトウェアエンジニアとは？

雇用条件

雇用形態

正社員
• 試用期間：入社後3ヶ月（本採用と同条件)

オフィス

六本木
• 受動喫煙対策: 屋内全面禁煙
• メルカリには「YOUR CHOICE」というワークスタイルに関する制度があります。オフィス出社をすることも、フルリモートワークを選択することも���由に選択することができます。※一部職種を除く

勤務時間
• フレックスタイム制（コアタイムなし・フレキシブルタイムなし）
※一部職種を除くため、ご応募の際にお問合せください。

休日・休暇
• 完全週休2日制（祝祭日、年末年始 等）
• 有給休暇、慶弔休暇、リラックス休暇、Sick Leave

給与
• 月給制（固定残業代含む）
• スキル・経験・能力に応じて決定いたします
• 毎年2回見直し

ベネフィット
• 各種社会保険完備
• インセンティブ制度

items:
JD in Japanese follows. 英文の後に和文JDをご覧いただけます。

Introduction

Circulate all forms of value to unleash the potential in all people

"What can I do to help society thrive with the finite resources we have?" The Mercari marketplace app was born in 2013 out of this thought by our founder Shintaro Yamada as he traveled the world. We believe that by circulating all forms of value, not just physical things and money, we can create opportunities for anyone to realize their dreams and contribute to society and the people around them. Mercari aims to use technology to connect people all over the world and create a world where anyone can unleash their potential.For more information about Mercari Group’s mission, see Mercari's Culture Doc.

Equal Opportunity Hiring

Here at Mercari, we work to realize a world in which no one’s potential is limited by their background and everyone has the opportunity to freely create value. We also firmly believe that a mindset of Diversity & Inclusion is essential... for us to achieve our mission.

This, of course, extends to our hiring practices as well. Mercari is committed to eliminating discrimination based on age, gender, sexual orientation, race, religion, physical disability, and other such factors so that anyone who shares our mission and values can join us, regardless of their background. For more details, please read our D&I Statement.

Team’s Mission / Work Responsibilities
• Mercari is preparing to launch a new business as its next step to enhance the creation of a circular economy.
• The team in charge of this new business is working to create a resale service platform that anyone, both individuals and businesses, can easily use. By creating a system to recirculate the 43.7 trillion yen worth of “hidden assets”1 in Japan, we hope to further expand Japan’s secondhand market, which is currently estimated to be 3 trillion yen.
• In concrete terms, our business consists of making the reusing of items the norm by breaking down the borders between online and offline and between primary and secondary distribution. This marks the first time Mercari has taken on such a challenge, and it contains a lot of hidden potential.
• (Learn more about Mercari's mission and values here.)
• The value of “hidden assets” is defined as the quantity of unneeded items sitting in households in Japan (as found in a survey) converted to Japanese yen using the average value of transactions on Mercari. “Unneeded items” is defined as items that have not been used for at least one year, but remain in the household for no particular reason

Specific work responsibilities include the following:
• Lead the launch of a new platform for the Recommerce area.
• Select the technologies and create the system architecture and specifications necessary to develop a new platform.
• Design and implement a web frontend that uses various kinds of frameworks such as TypeScript and React.

Unique and Bold Challenges
• Our business is directly linked to Mercari Group’s mission of “circulate all forms of value to unleash the potential in all people.”
• As this is a new business and team made up of a select few, you will be expected to take on a broad range of responsibilities.
• In your role, you’ll work on developing a new platform for promoting secondary distribution, and be involved in various decision-making in the 0 > 1 phase of our business. We’re therefore looking for someone who will go beyond simply using and expanding Mercari’s existing systems.　

Required Qualifications
• Shared belief in the mission and values of Mercari Group and its various companies
• Ability to work flexibly and independently in a constantly evolving environment
• Experience selecting middleware and designing software architecture
• Ability to take ownership and lead the software development process
• Knowledge of and experience in web application development
• Basic knowledge of performance, accessibility, and security
• Conceptual understanding of version management and development experience using Git
• Knowledge of TypeScript and development experience working with UI libraries or frameworks such as React, Vue.js, and Angular
• Skills for understanding and providing basic explanations of web operation principles and browsers　

Preferred Qualifications
• Experience establishing new services and tackling the challenges in the growth phase of a service
• Experience leading or managing developers and experience improving the development process
• Extensive knowledge of standard web technologies and specialized knowledge in some areas
• Understanding of the characteristics of different libraries/frameworks and the ability to advance their introduction to projects where necessary
• Experience of architecture design based on the characteristics of an application
• Experience of consistently taking initiative in implementing improvements to an application
• Basic knowledge of GraphQL

Screening Criteria
• Shares our belief in the mission and values of Mercari Group and its various companies
• Has leadership ability, flexibility, and agility
• Takes ownership of their work and puts forth maximum effort
• Able to find joy in the unknown and focus on the “cans” rather than the “cannots”
• Has a passion for creating new business
• Able to share the sentiment of Mercari Group that “everyone is a software engineer”

　(See this page for details.)

Key Points for Technical Assignments
• Rather than testing the depth of your knowledge of unique technologies or frameworks, the system design interview will check your overall ability to define the issue in front of you and see how, through your thought process, you come to a solution while communicating with your team members.
• Specifically, we will check the following points:
• How effectively do you communicate with the interviewer?
• If there are any system requirements that you do not know, are you able to ask questions and reach an accurate understanding?
• How do you work to resolve a problem that has no single correct answer?
• How do you make considerations for scalability and availability?
• If solving a problem results in a tradeoff, how do you approach decision-making?
• What sort of thought process do you go through to improve on ideas?
• Do you have a grasp of what system problems and improvements there are?

Language Requirements
• English：Independent (CEFR - B2) optional
• Japanese：Proficient (CEFR - C1) preferred
• Click here for more information about CEFR.

Related Articles
• Eight Keywords for Delving Into Mercari: Our First 10 Years and the Potential and Future We Seek to Unleash / The Seventh Keyword: “Our Connection to Society”
• Shintaro Yamada on Mercari’s 10th Anniversary and Its Past and Future: “There is still a lot I want to do, and I’m excited for what’s to come” | DIAMOND SIGNAL (only available in Japanese)
• Transcript: All About Our Product Development System—What Is “Everyone Is a Software Engineer”? (only available in Japanese)

Working Conditions

Employment Status

Full-time
• Probationary period: First 3 months after joining the company. (During this period your contract conditions will be the same as that of a permanent employee.)

Office

Roppongi
• Smoking is prohibited within our offices
• Mercari has introduced a work style policy called “Your Choice.” Each member is free to choose whether they want to work in the office or work fully remote. *Exceptions made for certain kinds of work.

Work Hours
• Full flextime (no “core time” or “flex time”)
• Does not apply to all positions

Holidays
• Two days off per week (as well as national holidays, New Year's break, etc.)
• Paid leave, congratulatory and bereavement leave, relax days, sick leave

Salary
• Annual salary paid in 12 monthly installments (including fixed overtime allowance)
• Based on skills, experience, and abilities
• Reviewed twice a year

Benefits
• Complete health and social insurance
• Incentive program
• Support systems, including those that benefit the employee’s family members
• See this page for details.

Support
• Relocation support
• Language learning support
• Translation/interpretation support
• See this page for details.

Owned Media

はじめに

あらゆる価値を循環させ、あらゆる人の可能性を広げる

「地球資源が限られているなか、より豊かな社会をつくるために何ができるか」。2013年、創業者の山田進太郎が世界一周の旅で抱いた課題意識から、フリマアプリ「メルカリ」は生まれました。私たちは、物理的なモノやお金に限らずあらゆる価値を循環させることで、誰もがやりたいことを実現し、人や社会に貢献するための選択肢を増やすことができると信じています。

テクノロジーの力で世界中の人々をつなぎ、あらゆる人の可能性が発揮される世界を実現していきます。メルカリグループの目指すべき方針についてはMercari Culture Docをご覧ください。

選考における機会の平等

メルカリでは、バックグラウンドによって個人の可能性が決めつけられることなく、自由に価値を生みだす機会を手にできる社会の実現を目指しています。そしてメルカリがミッションを実現するために「Diversity & Inclusion」という考え方は不可欠な存在だと考えています。

採用活動においても、メルカリのミッション・バリューに共感する、様々なバックグラウンドの方にジョインしていただけるよう、年齢、性別、性的指向、人種、宗教、身体能力、その他記号に基づくあらゆる差別をなくすことを約束します。詳しくはD&I statementをご覧ください。

募集要項

チームのミッション / 業務内容
• メルカリでは、循環型社会の実現に向けた新たなチャレンジとして、新規事業の立ち上げを準備しています。
• 新規事業チームは、あらゆる個人、あらゆる事業者が、誰でもかんたん��利用できる、Resale Serviceのプラットフォームを構築し、43.7兆円ある日本の「かくれ資産」を再流通させる仕組みを作ることを通じて、現在3兆円規模の日本のリユース市場をさらに拡大していくことを目指しています。
• 具体的には、オンラインとオフライン、一次流通と二次流通の垣根を超えて、リユースをもっと身近で当たり前の営みにしていく事業となります。メルカリとして初めての取り組みであり、多くのポテンシャルが秘められています。

※メルカリのミッション・バリューについての詳細はこちらをご覧ください
※ “かくれ資産”とは、1年以上使用しておらず、理由なく家庭内に保管しているモノを不要品とし、不要品保管数量調査および「メルカリ」の平均取引価格により不要品を金額に換算した数値と定義しています。

具体的な業務内容は下記です。
• Recommerce領域の新規プラットフォームの立ち上げのリード
• 新規プラットフォーム開発のための技術選定 / システムアーキテクチャの構築 / 仕様作成
• TypeScriptとReactなどの各種フレームワークを使ったWeb Frontendの設計 / 実装

ユニークなチャレンジ
• メルカリの「あらゆる価値を循環させ、あらゆる人の可能性を広げる」というグループミッションに直結するビジネスです。
• 少数精鋭で立ち上げる新規事業チームのため、事業立ち上げに向けた横断的な役割が求められます。
• 既存のメルカリのシステムを活用・拡張するだけでなく、二次流通を促進させるための新規のプラットフォームを開発していくため、0→1のフェーズで様々な意思決定に関わることができます。

必須条件
• メルカリグループおよび各カンパニーのミッションとバリューに共感していただける
• 不確実性の高い環境であっても柔軟かつ自律的に開発に取り組む力
• ソフトウェアアーキテクチャの設計とミドルウェア選定の経験
• オーナーシップを持ってソフトウェアの開発を進める力
• Webアプリケーション開発の知識と経験
• パフォーマンス・アクセシビリティ・セキュリティに関する基本的な知識
• バージョン管理の概念への理解と、Git を用いた開発経験
• TypeScript に関する知識と、React・Vue.js・Angular といった何らかの UI ライブラリやフレームワークを用いた開発経験
• Web の動作原理やブラウザに関する理解と、基本的な説明スキル　

歓迎条件
• 新規サービスの立ち上げやサービスの成長期におけるチャレンジの経験
• 開発者のリードやマネジメント、プロセス改善の経験
• Web 標準技術に関する深い知識と、なんらかの得意分野
• ライブラリやフレームワークの特性への理解と、プロジェクト導入を適切に進める力
• アプリケーションの特性に応じたアーキテクチャの設計経験
• アプリケーションの改善を、自発的かつ継続的に実施した経験
• GraphQLに対する基本的な知識

選考のポイント
• メルカリグループおよび各カンパニーのミッションとバリューに共感できるか
• 率先力、柔軟性、スピード力があるか
• 担当の仕事に対して責任感を持ち、最大限の努力ができるか
• 曖昧で不確実な状況を楽しみ、「できない理由」ではなく「できる方法」を考えられるか
• 新規事業への高い熱量を持っているか
• メルカリグループの「全員ソフトウェアエンジニア」という考え方に対して共感できるか

※詳しくはこちらのページをご覧ください。

技術課題のポイント
• System Design Interviewを行い、特定の技��やフレームワークに対する深い知識よりも、直面する課題をどう定義し、どのような思考を経て、チームメンバーとどうコミュニケーションしながら解決に導くかといった総合的な能力をチェックします。
• 具体的には以下のポイントをチェックします。
• 面接官とどのようなコミュニケーションを行うか
• システムの要件への不明点があれば質問をし、正しく認識できるか
• 正解のない問題への解決にどのように取り組むか
• スケーラビリティーと可用性をどう考慮するか
• 問題解決にトレードオフが発生した場合にどのような意思決定をするか
• どのような思考プロセスを経てアイディアを改善するか
• システムの問題点や改善点を把握しているか

語学力
• 英語：Independent (CEFR - B2) 歓迎
• 日本語：Proficient (CEFR - C1) 必須
※ CEFRの詳細については、こちらをご覧ください

関連記事

雇用形態

正社員
• 試用期間：入社後3ヶ月（本採用と同条件)

オフィス

六本木
• 受動喫煙対策: 屋内全面禁煙
• メルカリには「YOUR CHOICE」というワークスタイルに関する制度があります。オフィス出社をすることも、フルリモートワークを選択することも自由に選択することができます。※一部職種を除く

勤務時間
• フレックスタイム制（コアタイムなし・フレキシブルタイムなし）
※一部職種を除くため、ご応募の際にお問合せください。

休日・休暇
• 完全週休2日制（祝祭日、年末年始 等）
• 有給休暇、慶弔休暇、リラックス休暇、Sick Leave

給与
• 月給制（固定残業代含む）
• スキル・経験・能力に応じて決定いたします
• 毎年2回見直し

ベネフィット

title: Software Engineer Java F/M
description:
Our client is a Hong Kong Fintech company providing a technology platform bringing together a community of financial institutions and licensed operators.

Responsibilities

• Work with our internal business teams to analyse & produce new functional modules, or

enhance/maintain existing modules to ensure business requirements are met.

• Involve in software deployment.

• Ensuring the performance, efficiency, quality and responsiveness of developed applications met

certain expectations by the IT unit.

• To plan, facilitate and execute UAT testing sessions, working alongside with external teams (if

necessary) for full resolution of UAT issues.

• Practice and follow proper software design & development methods, including DevOps.

• Prepare and maintain technical related documentation such as Technical Specification, Technical

Manual & etc.

Requirements

• B.S degree in Computer Science or relevant field of study.

• At least 3 years of Java software related working experience.

•... Comfortable in using Java technology for web-based applications, preferably in Apache Maven,

Spring and Hibernate, HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

• Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.

• Good understanding of Internet technology, and n-tier architecture.

• Open-minded to new solutions, forward-thinking and strong ability to adapt.

• Good database and SQL skills, especially Postgres

Proficient in English and Japanese

This is a full-remote position

description:
【求人の要約　summary】
・プロジェクトはSierからで大手長期の案件です。
・Javaをメインに3年以上の経験
・資格取得制度や各種研修充実

＞＞エンジニアのキャリアを今後も作っていきたい方、スキルアップをしていきたい方にはおすすめです。案件もあり、成長をサポートしてくれる体制もあります。
ぜひご検討してみてください。＞＞

◎システムエンジニアとして、業務系・WEB系など幅広く
システムの開発に従事いただきます。

・官公庁、製造、医療、金融、交通など、様々な業界の案件があります。
案件によっては上流フェーズに携われる案件もあり、
採用される方のスキル・経験によって業務をお任せいたします。

≪業務特徴／案件例≫

・言語：C#、VC++、Java／OS：Windows、Linux／DB：Oracle/SQL Developer

■魅力：
・エンジニア想いの代表の下、働きやすい環境を実現しています。
同社では不定期にエンジニアと面談を設けており、

基本的には長期の案件（３～10年）が多く、腰を据えて就業していただける環境です。

via: via Mamakoko JOB-マ��ココジョブ-
description:
◎ITリーディングカンパニーや大手IT企業との協業を中心として
　トレンドプロジェクトに携わっていただきます。

【インフラ関連プロジェクトが多数】
◎現在は、オンプレミスからクラウドサーバへの移行や、ネットワーク・サーバの運用・保守といったプロジェクトが多数稼働しています。
◎経験が浅い方の「スキルアップしたい」「上流工程に参画したい」
「直受けで仕事をしたい」というご希望にお応えできる環境です。
◎今後は、クラウドサーバ、DBに関連するプロジェクトの割合を増加させていくため、
　さらに活躍できるフィールドは広がっていきます。

＜プロジェクト例＞
■ServiceNow基盤システム構築
・知識・スキル／Linuxサーバベースのシステム構築経験、LPIC-1相当以上の知識

■会計パッケージ企業の情報システム部で社内インフラ構築
・知識・スキル／Linux、Windowsサーバーの運用・保守、Azure、AWSの構築・運用経験

■企業内ITヘルプデスク
・知識・スキル／電話受付メインの企業向けITヘルプデスク経験、ITインフラに関する
　基本的な知識、Word、Excelなどを使用した表・手順書・フロー作成スキル

【開発プロジェクト支援関連】
◎開発プロジェクトも支援しているため、開発分野に携わることも可能です。
・地方自治体のスマートシティ施策と連動したIoTサービスの企画
・キャリア向け通信機器設定自動化ツール開発
・AIと画像処理技術を組み合わせた、大手印刷会社向け実証実験
・メーカーのイノベーション部門と協業した、FinTech領域の研究開発
・AI／IoT／ビッグデータ等を地方自治体で活用するための業務コンサルティング案件

～将来的には管理職へとキャリアアップも～

・将来は管理職へと進むキャリアパスもあります。
　そのためにはエンジニアとしての知識・スキルだけでなく、マネジメント能力も
　磨いていかなければなりません。
　同社には資格取得支援制度や外部研修など、学べる機会が豊富にあるため、
　着実にステップアップしていくことができます。

（M346）

title: Python Web Developer
description:
We are seeking an experienced Python Web Developer with a strong understanding of AWS services. This individual will work as a critical member of our engineering team. This role requires a high level of proficiency in Python programming and extensive knowledge of AWS infrastructure. The ideal candidate will have a keen understanding of the latest web development methodologies and a familiarity with Django Web Framework.
Responsibilities
• Develop and maintain robust and secure web applications using Python.
• Leverage your expertise in AWS services for the development, deployment, and scaling of our web applications.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and implement new features and modules.
• Write well-designed, testable, and efficient code following best software development practices.
• Provide technical leadership, mentoring, and bring a passion for technology to motivate and inspire.
Requirements
• Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information... Systems, or equivalent relevant experience.
• Proven experience as a Web Developer using Python. Knowledge of frameworks like Django or Flask is essential.
• Strong experience with AWS services including but not limited to EC2, RDS, S3, Lambda, and SQS.
• Experience in deploying applications using containers (Docker, Kubernetes).
• Strong knowledge of software implementation best practices, especially in areas of scalability and security.
• Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Nice to haves

While not required, tell us if you have any of the following.
• Familiarity with front-end technologies (like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React

title: J2ee web developer(PRODUCTION SUPPORT)
company_name: コグニザントジャパン株式会社
via: 提供元: キャリコネ転職
description:
■About Cognizant

Cognizant (NASDAQ-100: CTSH) is one of the world's leading professional services companies, transforming clients' business, operating and technology models for the digital era. Our unique industry-based, consultative approach helps clients envision, build and run more innovative and efficient businesses. Headquartered in the U.S., Cognizant is ranked 230 on the Fortune 500 and is consistently listed among the most admired companies in the world.

■About the role：

To develop and provide high quality operational and technical application and systems support to customers and internal business functions. Minimizing the adverse impact of Incidents and Problems on the business and preventing reoccurrence of Incidents.

■the J2EE WEB DEVELOPER (PRODUCTION SUPPORT ) will:

＜Application Support＞

・Working knowledge of JAVA/J2EE web based applications

・Interact with internal teams and external 3rd party vendors to trouble shoot and resolve complex problems

・Design... appropriate metrics for reporting on key performance and quality indicators, particularly in terms of in-depth trend analysis

・Maintain application monitoring, performance tuning and testing

・Provide timely and export advice on emerging trends and issues affecting Service Delivery and Support. Develop strategies to allow Application Support to manage resultant problems

＜Personal and Team Development＞

・Share / spread knowledge with team members as well as internal teams

・Pro-active in maintaining and increasing the teams and your own technical knowledge

・Identify training needs or requirements for yourself individually and for the team

・Coach and develop team members

・Delivering project within agreed timeframes

＜Documentation＞

・Ensure incidents and problems are up-to-date

・Ensure all technical and non-technical documentation is up-to-date

・Contribute to management reports

＜Critical Success Factors＞

・Achieving high levels of user satisfaction

Demonstration of ownership of problems

Measured contribution towards the reduction of aged problems

Measured contribution towards maintaining a level of expectations with customers internally/externally for services provided

Incidents and problems are resolved within SLA

■Experience - Essential（全14項目あります。9項目目以降は応募資格欄に記載しています）

1. Hands-on Java/J2EE programming and diagnostic experience

2. Configuration and support of enterprise software applications

3. Knowledge of Oracle and/or SQL server, including the ability to write complex SQL queries

4. Knowledge of application servers such as Tomcat, Jboss, and WebSphere

5. Experience of designing, coding, testing and installing application programs across multiple platforms.

6. Strong documentation skills, troubleshooting experience and strong analysis skills.

7. Excellent communication skills

8. Hands on experience in designing and developing applications using Java EE platforms

title: Web Developer
description:
仕事内容:

【ウェアラブル製品のウェブサービス開発】

「Designing Super-Human - テック x デザインで人の感性を拡張する」を理念として、成長中のスタートアップのソフトウェアエンジニアを若干名募集しています。

Borderlessでは、スマートヘルメットシステムの開発を行っており、世界的にも注目度の高い革新的製品であるクロスヘルメット（CrossHelmet : https://crosshelmet.com)および産業向けシステム クロスウェア（CrossWare : https://crosswares.com）を開発しています。現場の仕事をより安全で魅力ある体験にしていくための私たちの挑戦に加わりませんか？

開発環境はReactやVue、node.js、GitHubをはじめとして、ウェブアプリケーション開発をメインに行っていただきます。3年以上の開発経験を持っている方を優遇します。日々めまぐるしく状況が変わるスタートアップならではの事業環境に対して、スピード感をもって業務にあたります。

多岐にわたる業務内容から、組織運営に関わる幅広い経験を積むチャンスがあります。

アピールポイント:

【クリエティブな環境で気持ちよく仕事】

会社はクリエイティブな環境で、カフェ・飲食店も多い神保町／御茶の水エリアにあります。最寄駅から徒歩 4 分の一棟リノベーションビルにオフィスを構えており、明るく静かな環境の中で集中して業務に取り組むことができます。メンバーは多国籍で、グローバルな視野をもった仲間と切磋琢磨することができます。

革新的な製品の立ち上げに興味のある方、スタートアップで大きなチャレンジを求める方の応募をお待ちしています。

求める人材:

【クリエティブスマートな人材】

実務経験... 3年以上。

創造的で自分で考えて行動ができる、キャリアアップや成長に貪欲な人材を求めています。思いついたアイデアを積極的に共有し、会社をより良くしていくために行動できる方が理想です。

チームのメンバーは日本語と英語を話すメンバーが半々のため、日常会話程度の英語が話せる方を歓迎します。明るくオープンな性格を持って、チームワークを重んじる方。難易度の高い問題にも積極的に取り組める方。

メンバー全員に共通する特徴は、「クリエイティブ・ハードワーカー・誠実・協力的」です。

勤務時間・曜日:

【効率性の高いワークスタイル】

月曜〜金曜日（勤務時間 9時始業〜18時終業、休憩 1時間）

※ 許可制によるフレックスタイム勤務も可

休暇・休日:

【フレキシブルな休暇制度】

土曜・日曜、春のゴールデンウィーク休暇、夏季休暇、冬季休暇は週末と合わせて 10日以上も可

※ 日本の祝日は営業日となります

プライベートの事情などある場合は、一時的に 1ヶ月〜の休みを取得することもできます

勤務地:

【東京の中心で働く】

勤務地は東京の中心、千代田区神田です。大手町や丸の内も徒歩圏内です。

東京メトロ 神保町駅から徒歩 4 分、JR御茶の水駅から徒歩 10 分の一棟リノベーションビルにオフィスを構えています。下町の風情が残り、近隣には書店、レストラン、バー、カフェなどが多く、便利な立地です。

現在はリモートワークとオフィス勤務のハイブリッド型になっています。

アクセス:

【駅至近で明るく静かな環境】

東京メトロ 神保町駅から徒歩 4分、JR御茶の水駅から徒歩 10分。

自転車通勤OK。バイク通勤要相談。伝統ある下町の雰囲気が色濃く残る、明るく静かな環境です。

待遇・福利厚生:

【働きやすさ重視】

経験豊富な方に対しては働き方は比較的柔軟に調整し、成果を重視します。

各種保険完備（厚生年金・雇用保険・健康保���・労災保険）、昇給チャンスあり、交通費支給。（月上限あり）

少人数による事業運営のため、能力のある方は素早く昇給・昇格される体制です。特別な業績を上げた場合、賞与が支給されることもあります。採用時には試用期間（3ヶ月〜6ヶ月）が設定されます。

ストックオプション制度あり。

その他:

【海外経験の機会】

製品の海外展開、マーケティングを積極的に行っているため、海外文化や言語を学ぶチャンスが豊富にあります。社内コミュニケーションは英語と日本語が半々となっているため、英会話の上達を目指す方にも理想的な環境です。

While this position welcomes foreign applicants, it does require a high level of Japanese ability; therefore, the job description text is listed only in... Japanese.

☆☆☆仕事内容☆☆☆
【概要】
Webアプリケーション開発全般をお願いします。顧客との要件調整、設計を主に担当し、開発は当社のパートナー企業で実施、受入テスト、システムテストからリリースに至る開発工程を担当していただきます。志向性に応じて、積極的にプロジェクトマネジメントの経験を活かしていただくことも可能です。

【具体的な仕事内容】
クライアントの企画会議で決まった内容をもとに要件定義～基本設計～詳細設計をお願いしてます。

■新規サービス・新機能の要件定義・設計・開発
■既存サービスの再設計、機能追加
■テスト仕様書の作成、テスターへの指示

【仕事の魅力】
クライアントのパートナーとして、システムの開発だけではなく事業の企画段階に近いポジションで設計を⼿掛けられる。
クライアントから直接の大規模な案件や全ての工程一貫して携われる案件まで、多種多様な案件を頂いているので、ご自身の経験やスキルを最大限活かし、さらなるスキルアップやプロジェクトマネージメント能力を高めていただきたいと思います。

【開発環境】
オフショアでの開発体制をとっています。要件定義から設計を行い、開発者と意思疎通を図りながら新規サービスの最終リリースまで担当いただきます。（設計書の作成、海外とのやり取りは日本語で問題ありません。）

言語としてはPython、JavaScriptを用いた開発が多くなるかと思われます。インフラに関してはAWSのサービスを主とした先端クラウド技術を積極的に取り入れています。

■開発言語：Python、JavaScript
■フレームワーク：AWS SAM
■OS：Mac/Linux
■DB：MySQL/NoSQL/Oracle/PostgreSQL
■インフラ：AWS

☆☆☆応募資格☆☆☆
学歴不問 / 経験者のみ募集
【必須要件】
■サーバレスアプリケーションの開発実務経験 1年以上
■サーバレスアーキテクチャの理解
■PHP等を用いたWebアプリケーションの設計・開発経験

【歓迎要件】
■LAMPの基礎知識
■大規模なWebアプリケーションの構築・運用経験
■データベース、モバイルサイト、AWS環境の構築・運用経験
■AWS Lambda、API Gatewayの利用経験
■PL、PM経験のある⽅
■Gitを用いたバージョン管理とそれに付随するワークフロー（git-flowおよびgithub-flowなど）での開発経験
■RESTful APIにおいて、Swagger等を用いた効率的なIF仕様書の運用経験

【求める人物像】
■会社とともに成長したい方
■新しい技術への興味が強く、絶えず情報収集を行い、自身で研究、スキルアップができる方
■受け身にならず自らの仕事を作り、取り組める方
■コミュニケーションが円滑に行え信頼関係を築ける方

☆☆☆募集背景☆☆☆
Webやスマホ向けのアプリ開発を⼿掛けてきた当社。⼤⼿企業との直接取引が9割を占��ており、厚い信頼を寄せられています。設⽴当初から取引のある企業が多く、安定した経営基盤を築けているのが特徴です。

東京近況に在住の方で、東京都内で実施する打ち合わせに参加できる方を対象としています。

今後の事業拡大に伴う人員強化のため、エンジニアの積極採用を行っておりますので、ご興味お持ちいただけましたら、是非ご応募下さい。

☆☆☆勤務地☆☆☆
自宅（東京近郊）
在宅勤務を基本として、必要に応じて都内客先での打合せに参加していただく想定です。

☆☆☆勤務時間☆☆☆
9:00 ～ 18:00
実動8時間（休憩：60分）

☆☆☆給与☆☆☆
年俸　3,000,000円　～　6,000,000円
年棒制
※年俸の1／12を月々支給
※上記年俸には、固定残業代（40時間分、⽉5.96万円～11.91万円）を含みます。超過分は別途⽀給。
※試用期間（3ヶ月）は月額給与が90％になります。

☆☆☆休日休暇☆☆☆
■年間休⽇120⽇以上
■完全週休2⽇制（⼟・⽇）
■祝⽇
■夏季休暇（3⽇）
■年末年始休暇（5～7⽇）
■有給休暇
■慶弔休暇
■特別休暇
■産前・産後休暇（取得実績あり）

☆☆☆福利厚生☆☆☆
■給与改定年1回（3⽉）
■決算賞与あり（業績によります。本年度⽀給あり。）
■交通費全額⽀給
■各種社会保険完備（雇⽤・労災・健康・厚⽣年⾦）
■出張⼿当
■役職⼿当
■健康診断
■社員旅⾏（過去には沖縄、台湾、城崎など）
■服装自由
■ テレワーク・在宅OK

We 151A have several more positions we can introduce you.
Please feel free to contact us if you are looking for a position in a Japanese company.
I will be happy to be of help to you.

私たち 151A は他にもご紹介できる求人情報を確保しております。
日本で就職を考えていらっしゃいましたらお気軽にご連絡ください。
お手伝いができましたら光栄です。

title: Python Web Developer
description:
We are seeking an experienced Python Web Developer with a strong understanding of AWS services. This individual will work as a critical member of our engineering team. This role requires a high level of proficiency in Python programming and extensive knowledge of AWS infrastructure. The ideal candidate will have a keen understanding of the latest web development methodologies and a familiarity with Django Web Framework.

Responsibilities
• Develop and maintain robust and secure web applications using Python.
• Leverage your expertise in AWS services for the development, deployment, and scaling of our web applications.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and implement new features and modules.
• Write well-designed, testable, and efficient code following best software development practices.
• Provide technical leadership, mentoring, and bring a passion for technology to motivate and inspire.

Requirements
• Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Information... Systems, or equivalent relevant experience.
• Proven experience as a Web Developer using Python. Knowledge of frameworks like Django or Flask is essential.
• Strong experience with AWS services including but not limited to EC2, RDS, S3, Lambda, and SQS.
• Experience in deploying applications using containers (Docker, Kubernetes).
• Strong knowledge of software implementation best practices, especially in areas of scalability and security.
• Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Nice to haves

While not required, tell us if you have any of the following.
• Familiarity with front-end technologies (like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React

仕事内容 概要 Webアプリケーション開発全般をお願いします 顧客との要件調整 設計を主に担当し 開発は当社のパートナー企業で実施 受入テスト システムテストからリリースに至る開発工程を担当していただきます 志向性に応じて 積極的にプロジェクトマネジメントの経験を活かしていただくことも可能です 具体的な仕事内容 クライアントの企画会議で決まった内容をもとに要件定義 基本設計 詳細設計をお願いしてます 新規サービス 新機能の要件定義 設計 開発 既存サービスの再設計 機能追加 テスト仕様書の作成 テスターへの指示 仕事の魅力 クライアントのパートナーとして システムの開発だけではなく事業の企画段階に近いポジションで設計を 掛けられる クライアントから直接の大規模な案件や全ての工程一貫して携われる案件まで 多種多様な案件を頂いているので ご自身の経験やスキルを最大限活かし さらなるスキルアップやプロジェクトマネージメント能力を高めていただきたいと思います 開発環境 オフショアでの開発体制をとっています 要件定義から設計を行い 開発者と意思疎通を図りながら新規サービスの最終リリースまで担当いただきます 設計書の作成 海外とのやり取りは日本語で問題ありません 言語としてはPython JavaScriptを用���た開発が多くなるかと思われます インフラに関してはAWSのサービスを主とした先端クラウド技術を積極的に取り入れています 開発言語 Python JavaScript フレームワーク AWS SAM OS Mac / Linux DB MySQL / NoSQL / Oracle / PostgreSQL インフラ AWS 応募資格 学歴不問 / 経験者のみ募集 必須要件 サーバレスアプリケーションの開発実務経験 1年以上 サーバレスアーキテクチャの理解 PHP等を用いたWebアプリケーションの設計 開発経験 歓迎要件 LAMPの基礎知識... 大規模なWebアプリケーションの構築 運用経験 データベース モバイルサイト AWS環境の構築 運用経験 AWS Lambda API Gatewayの利用経験 PL PM経験のある Gitを用いたバージョン管理とそれに付随するワークフロー git-flowおよびgithub-flowなど での開発経験 RESTful APIにおいて Swagger等を用いた効率的なIF仕様書の運用経験 求める人物像 会社とともに成長したい方 新しい技術への興味が強く 絶えず情報収集を行い 自身で研究 スキルアップができる方 受け身にならず自らの仕事を作り 取り組める方 コミュニケーションが円滑に行え信頼関係を築ける方 募集背景 Webやスマホ向けのアプリ開発を 掛けてきた当社 企業との直接取引が9割を占めており 厚い信頼を寄せられています 設 当初から取引のある企業が多く 安定した経営基盤を築けているのが特徴です 東京近況に在住の方で 東京都内で実施する打ち合わせに参加できる方を対象としています 今後の事業拡大に伴う人員強化のため エンジニアの積極採用を行っておりますので ご興味お持ちいただけましたら 是非ご応募下さい 勤務地 自宅 東京近郊 在宅勤務を基本として 必要に応じて都内客先での打合せに参加していただく想定です 勤務時間 9 : 00 18 : 00実動8時間 休憩 60分 給与 年俸 3,000,000円 6,000,000円年棒制 年俸の1 12を月々支給 上記年俸には 固定残業代 40時間分 5.

96万円 11.91万円 を含みます 超過分は別途 給 試用期間 3ヶ月 は月額給与が90 になります 休日休暇 年間休 120 以上 完全週休2 制 祝 夏季休暇 3 年末年始休暇 5 7 有給休暇 慶弔休暇 特別休暇 産前 産後休暇 取得実績あり 福利厚生 給与改定年1回 3 決算賞与あり 業績によります 本年度 給あり 交通費全額 給 各種社会保険完備 雇 労災 健康 厚 年 出張 当 役職 当 健康診断 社員旅 過去には沖縄 台湾 城崎など 服装自由 テレワーク 在宅OKWe 151A have several more positions we can introduce you.

Please feel free to contact us if you are looking for a position in a Japanese company.I will be happy to be of help to you.

私たち 151A は他にもご紹介できる求人情報を確保しております 日本で就職を考えていらっしゃいましたらお気軽にご連絡ください お手伝いができましたら光栄です

title: Web Developer
description:
Our firm is seeking a creative Web Developer that can work with our software application team to achieve our business’ digital goals. The ideal candidate for this position is a hands-on professional with strong knowledge of content management platforms, and an ability to translate our business needs into client-friendly functions that will expand our website’s influence in our industry. The Web Developer will be responsible for updating our current online applications, as well as developing and implementing a usability testing process to ensure that new website applications meet our company’s requirements.

Responsibilities
• Create applications that address the phases of SDLC (software development life cycle)
• Develop comprehensive application testing procedures
• Update existing applications to meet the security and functionality standards as outlined in the company’s website policies
• Implement testing tools that monitor the ongoing performance of the company website
• Assist in... updating application development policies to ensure that all future applications meet the latest technical requirements

title: Site Reliability Engineer
description:
職務内容

As a Site Reliability Engineer, you will be responsible for developing solutions, implementing requirements, assisting in creating key processes and procedures, that facilitate product planning, execution and delivery. We aim to solve society's issues with AI, so our mission is to solve the Engineering Department's issues!

応募資格（必須）
• Familiarity with at least one cloud platform (i.e. GCP, AWS, Azure, etc...)
• Experience in designing and implementing scalable cloud-based solution architectures
• Strong expertise in infrastructure-as-code solutions such as Terraform
• Strong operational expertise in containerization technologies, especially
• Kubernetes Knowledge of source control, CI/CD, infrastructure automation, orchestration, deployment automation and configuration management
• Bi-lingual (business English & Japanese daily conversation or English daily conversation & Japanese native)
• While our team is mostly english-speaking, you should be comfortable enough talking in... Japanese with other internal stakeholders

応募資格（歓迎）
• AWS Solutions Architect certifications or knowledge on par with those
• Kubernetes development experience, such as creation of in-house Helm charts
• Familiar with scripting languages (Shell, Python, Golang)
• Familiar with extended infrastructure-related tooling such as Ansible or Chef
• Experience in working with large software systems developed on Unix/Linux
• Experience of working with monitoring and metrics systems (e.g Collectd, Grafana, Nagios, etc.)
• Experience in working closely together with development, product and business teams
• Knowledge of web application security and best practices

求める人物像

You are comfortable at explaining complex recommendations to engineering and infrastructure teams, while discussing technical trade-offs in product development with other work colleagues. You are highly resourceful, analytical, and have a combination of focus, flexibility, self-motivation, and integrity.

Our team values communication with candor (openness, frankness, honesty) and the 4 Agile Values to ensure everybody can grow and progress together as well as support the company's CREDO and values, and you are comfortable to work in such an environment.

賃金

年収 600万円 ～ 1100万円

45時間を超える時間外労働分の割増賃金は追加で支給 ※経験・能力、希望を考慮の上、当社規定により決定 ※業務の内容に応じて、フレックス/裁量労働制または管理監督者としての勤務形態を適応

勤務地

105-0021 東京都港区東新橋１丁目９-２汐留住友ビル21階 地図で確認 都営大江戸線　汐留駅　直上 徒歩1分 ゆりかもめ 汐留駅　ペデストリアンデッキ直結 徒歩1分 山手線 京浜東北線 東海道線 横須賀線・総武線快速 「新橋駅」 地下通路直結 徒歩6分 銀座線 都営浅草線 　新橋駅 地下通路直結 徒歩5分

title: Senior Software Engineer (Python)
description:
We’re currently looking for a senior Python engineer to join our fast-paced growing team.

Responsibilities
• Design, develop, and maintain innovative features based on business needs
• Design scalable and fault-tolerant architecture in a distributed cloud deployment
• Ensure high quality deliverables by maintaining CI/CD, writing solid tests, and concise documentation
• Improve team synergy and mentor junior engineers
• Communicate with Design, Product Management and Customer Success teams
• Our tech stack: Python 3, asyncio, NoSQL, AWS, Docker.

Requirements
• 3 years of experience with Python backend development
• Strong background building scalable web applications in Python
• Ability to mentor junior engineers and work collaboratively in a team environment
• Experience with cloud infrastructure, such as AWS, GCP, or Azure
• Ability to automate deployments via CI/CD pipelines
• Understand the importance of clean code and software documentation
• Business level English (Japanese is... NOT required)
• Last but not least, fit with open source and hacker culture

Nice to haves

These aren’t required, but be sure to mention them in your application if you have them.
• Experience building large-scale distributed systems
• Deep experience with AWS
• Experience with asyncio based web frameworks in Python
• Knowledge of security concepts and technologies
• Deep knowledge of Linux environment
• Degree in Computer Science or other related technical field
• Team leadership experience

title: Front-end Developer - EC First Party Development Department (ECFD)
description:
Job Description

Business Overview

Rakuten is an EC company that owns Japan's largest platform called Rakuten Ichiba. The business model of Rakuten Ichiba is BtoBtoC, and Client Stores, Society and Rakuten Group work together as a unity. We cooperate and enlarge on the Rakuten Ichiba Platform.

Department Overview

On the other hand, we are taking on the challenge of a business model (BtoC) that leads our whole development by directly operating our own e-commerce that specializes in specific categories and understands each industry.

Rakuten EC Firstparty Department (ECFD) is a development organization responsible for those BtoC business and taking care from upstream to downstream of whole e-commerce business such as purchasing product, Sales through web-site, marketing and analysis.

Rakuten EC Firstparty Department (ECFD) is currently managing the following services

・Rakuten Books

・Rakuten Kobo

・Rakuten Fashion

・Rakuten Bic

・Netsuper

・Rakuten 24

Position

Why We Hire

Our... services are growing fast and we need new members to help us empower those services with a holistic approach.

Front end for users has been converted to a site based on JavaScript development, and we are looking for not only Java engineer as well as JavaScript engineer.

If you are interested in some specific Service, kindly advise it to HR when you apply.

Position Details

・Develop front end for each BtoC Service and also develop BFF.

・Develop new or existing function, design, test and release.

・Develop highly agile team to meet our speedy-changing business needs.

・Develop with cooperating with other various internal

team such as Search Team, Recommend Team.

・Conduct load tests, performance tuning, and make countermeasures for Sales promotion , in order to build a system that can withstand high traffic

・Discover problems, propose solutions, and make improvements to contribute to the BtoC business.

・Develop high quality applications (Requirements, Design, Development, Tests, Review, and Release).

・Do operations and improvements on the service after release.

In Particular, Your Responsibilities May Include

・Launching new BtoC services.

・Analyzing/developing features which are required in new/existing BtoC services.

・Developing libraries to increase development efficiency in BtoC services.

In this position, you will have a cross-sectional relationship with a variety of BtoC services. As such, you will have an opportunity to gain extensive knowledge and valuable experiences in the BtoC business.

Furthermore, as this is a newly opened position, you will be able to work with teams to help lay their foundations and pave the way. We are waiting for entries of motivated people.

Work Environment

You will work with ECFD members who have service oriented mind and flexible mind for the better. We have more than 200 members.

Mandatory Qualifications
• More than 3 years of experience of Web application development for consumers.
• Experience and basic knowledge of Linux/Unix.
• More than 3 years of experience and basic knowledge of HTML, JavaScript, and CSS.
• Experience and basic knowledge of the following languages

(React, Redux, Typescript, PHP, Java)
• Experience in developing applications using WEB-APIs.
• Basic knowledge of Web system security.

Desired Qualifications
• Experience in developing applications using React Hooks.
• Experience in web application development with SPA, SSR
• Experience of Docker and Kubernetes
• Basic knowledge of SEO
• More than 3 years of experience and basic knowledge of RDB.
• More than 1 year of experience and basic knowledge of Git.
• Experience with Agile methodology.
• Experience in designing/introducing of Middleware.
• Experience in development with frameworks such as Spring.
• Experience in design/development of BtoC application (especially experience in developing an EC site).

items:
Job Description

Business Overview

Rakuten is an EC company that owns Japan's largest platform called Rakuten Ichiba. The business model of Rakuten Ichiba is BtoBtoC, and Client Stores, Society and Rakuten Group work together as a unity. We cooperate and enlarge on the Rakuten Ichiba Platform.

Department Overview

On the other hand, we are taking on the challenge of a business model (BtoC) that leads our whole development by directly operating our own e-commerce that specializes in specific categories and understands each industry.

Rakuten EC Firstparty Department (ECFD) is a development organization responsible for those BtoC business and taking care from upstream to downstream of whole e-commerce business such as purchasing product, Sales through web-site, marketing and analysis.

Rakuten EC Firstparty Department (ECFD) is currently managing the following services

・Rakuten Books

・Rakuten Kobo

・Rakuten Fashion

・Rakuten Bic

・Netsuper

・Rakuten 24

Position

Why We Hire

Our... services are growing fast and we need new members to help us empower those services with a holistic approach.

Front end for users has been converted to a site based on JavaScript development, and we are looking for not only Java engineer as well as JavaScript engineer.

If you are interested in some specific Service, kindly advise it to HR when you apply.

Position Details

・Develop front end for each BtoC Service and also develop BFF.

・Develop new or existing function, design, test and release.

・Develop highly agile team to meet our speedy-changing business needs.

・Develop with cooperating with other various internal

team such as Search Team, Recommend Team.

・Conduct load tests, performance tuning, and make countermeasures for Sales promotion , in order to build a system that can withstand high traffic

・Discover problems, propose solutions, and make improvements to contribute to the BtoC business.

・Develop high quality applications (Requirements, Design, Development, Tests, Review, and Release).

・Do operations and improvements on the service after release.

In Particular, Your Responsibilities May Include

・Launching new BtoC services.

・Analyzing/developing features which are required in new/existing BtoC services.

・Developing libraries to increase development efficiency in BtoC services.

In this position, you will have a cross-sectional relationship with a variety of BtoC services. As such, you will have an opportunity to gain extensive knowledge and valuable experiences in the BtoC business.

Furthermore, as this is a newly opened position, you will be able to work with teams to help lay their foundations and pave the way. We are waiting for entries of motivated people.

Work Environment

You will work with ECFD members who have service oriented mind and flexible mind for the better. We have more than 200 members.

Mandatory Qualifications
• More than 3 years of experience of Web application development for consumers.
• Experience and basic knowledge of Linux/Unix.
• More than 3 years of experience and basic knowledge of HTML, JavaScript, and CSS.
• Experience and basic knowledge of the following languages

(React, Redux, Typescript, PHP, Java)
• Experience in developing applications using WEB-APIs.
• Basic knowledge of Web system security.

Desired Qualifications
• Experience in developing applications using React Hooks.
• Experience in web application development with SPA, SSR
• Experience of Docker and Kubernetes
• Basic knowledge of SEO
• More than 3 years of experience and basic knowledge of RDB.
• More than 1 year of experience and basic knowledge of Git.
• Experience with Agile methodology.
• Experience in designing/introducing of Middleware.
• Experience in development with frameworks such as Spring.
• Experience in design/development of BtoC application (especially experience in developing an EC site).

Others Information

Additional information on Location

Tokyo

title: Senior Web Developer- SK
description:
Job Description

■ Company Overview

We run the number one CMS (Content Management System) used in Japan and are expanding globally, with a listing on the Nasdaq stock exchange.

■ Your Role And Responsibilities
• Learn Rust to break boundaries and lead SaaS platform implementation.
• Drive full product tech lifecycle, supporting global expansion and integrating with external APIs.
• Collaborate closely with CTO, Designers, sales teams, and board members.
• Conduct code reviews, maintain code quality, and mentor fellow engineers.
• Take features from concept to fully-fledged product.

■ Experience And Qualifications
• Enthusiastic and driven to master Rust.
• Proficient in Ruby on Rails or Django (3+ years of experience).
• Preferably with a minimum of 5 years of relevant work experience (emphasizing knowledge over time).
• Skilled in working with SQL databases.
• Proficient in developing intricate modern web applications.
• Thorough understanding of the complete web technology stack... including HTTP, cookies, asset loading, caching, REST, etc.
• Well-versed in security best practices.

・Additional Preferred Qualifications
• Fluent in English for business communication.
• Japanese language skills not necessary (Open to applicants without Japanese proficiency).
• Strong knowledge of Rust is highly advantageous.
• Familiarity with functional or component testing of services.
• Experience in developing REST and WebSocket API clients.
• Basic understanding of signing encrypted requests.

■ Personal Traits
• Strong team player with excellent communication skills.
• Action-oriented with a practical mindset.
• Open to diverse cultures.
• Humble and eager to learn.
• Positive attitude and receptive to feedback.
• Self-motivated and independent.
• Good problem-solving and decision-making abilities.
• Effective time management and prioritization.
• Understanding of product strategies.
• Experience with global products.

■ Good Reasons to Join
• Commutation expenses provided.
• Two fully remote days per week (Wednesdays and Fridays).
• Emphasis on horizontal communication.
• Comprehensive benefits package including health insurance, employment insurance, workers' accident insurance, and pension.
• Flexible working hours with core hours from 10:00 to 15:00.
• Opportunity to work in an international and multicultural Japanese company.
• Opportunity to learn Rust and drive innovation in web development.
• Direct involvement in shaping product vision, strategy, and prioritization.
• Support for attending work-related training courses (expenses covered by the company at the discretion of the department head).
• Daily provision of complimentary coffee, tea, spring water, hot chocolate, and Japanese soups at the company.

■ Working Style

The standard working hours are 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, including a 1-hour lunch break. However, flexible working hours are also available, with a core time of 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM and a one-hour lunch break.

・Remote Work

There are 3 days of in-office work per week, while Wednesdays and Fridays are designated as full remote work days.

・Holidays
• Saturdays, Sundays, company holidays, and national holidays are observed.
• Employees are entitled to ten paid holidays per year, which become available after the first 6 months of employment. These holidays can be carried over to the following year, allowing for a maximum of 20 total days.
• Additionally, an extra paid holiday is granted every year, up to a maximum of 20 days, as a part of the company's benefits.

Five additional paid holidays are available upon joining the company.
• Other annual holidays include the New Year's period (e.g., December 30th to January 3rd), marriage leave, condolence leave, natural disaster leave, maternity leave, and sabbatical (after 3 consecutive years with the

company).

■ Interview Process

0 - Application screening

1 - First interview (HR and Department head)

2 - Second interview [Tech Skill] (HR and Department head)

3 - Offer (HR or department head

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
Cogent Labs is looking for a Full Stack developer with 4+ years of relevant experience to enhance our AI products and platforms using ReactJS, NodeJs, and other technologies. Successful candidates will join a highly skilled team, and should be able to design, build, test, and deploy high-quality frontend and backend features.

Responsibilities
• Work in a team with proper engineering practices through design, code review, and pair programming
• Implement new API and UI features/architectures in cooperation with other team members, including those in our machine learning team
• Write clean, scalable, readable, and testable code, and deploy to production often
• Communicate effectively inside and outside the team

Required skills
• At least 4 years of relevant experience contributing to a production system
• Strong coding fundamentals in Javascript/Typescript
• Excellent skills in the ReactJS ecosystem, HTML, and CSS for front-end development
• Experience with NodeJS for back-end... development, preferably using a modern web framework (e.g. Loopback)
• Experience with unit and integration test frameworks and automation (e.g. Jest, Cypress)
• Knowledge of basic database concepts

Preferred skills
• Experience refactoring and improving existing codebases
• Amazon Web Services (AWS)
• Docker, kubernetes, helm, and related technologies
• Security experience (e.g. authentication, authorization, Role-Based Access Control)
• Japanese language ability

Team culture

The Cogent Labs engineering department is continuously working towards developing a culture improving and rewarding the following qualities:
• Team effort: A cohesive team can be more effective than an isolated prodigy. Engineers are expected to work well in groups and look for opportunities to empower their colleagues.
• Ownership: Take full responsibility for your own projects and tasks and if needed, cross over boundaries in order to successfully deliver your project.
• Self-improvement: Create an environment where engineers can focus on their engineering tasks and self-improvement without excessive outside disturbances.
• Experimentation: Engineers should have some freedom in experimenting with new ideas and technologies, as this ultimately could translate into building better products or the creation of valuable new IP.
• Quality & Excellence: Maintaining a mindset of developing high quality features and code. We avoid cutting corners as much as possible.
• Customer Service: Being customer focused, not only externally but internally as well. This means developing services that not only improve the experience of our end customers, but also being ‘customer service’ oriented within your team and the company as a whole by helping out others and sharing knowledge.

The ideal candidate:
• can empathize Cogent Labs’ VISION and MISSION
• is a team player who aims for higher goals
• has integrity and humility, and shows respect and gratitude to others
• prefers open and transparent communication
• has a strong growth mindset
• can receive feedback positively and provide constructive feedback to others

title: Frontend Developer, Rakuten Ichiba - EC Marketplace Development...
description: Job Description: Business Overview Rakuten is one of theleading e-commerce companies in the world. Our mission is to empower people andsociety through the internet while aiming at becoming the Global Innovation Company. Rakuten group has morethan 70 businesses worldwide spanning e-commerce, digital content, communications and fin-tech, bringing together more than 1.2 billion members across the world. We have a diversified workforce made up of talented employees from more than 70 countries and regions. Department Overview For this position we are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. If you are an engineer who is passionate to build SMART: Scalable, Maintainable, Automated, Reliable, Technology cutting-edge systems we are the right choice for you! Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with UI/UX... designers and other engineers to bridge the gap between graphical design, user requirements and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works. Position: Why We Hire We are looking for passionate and innovative engineer who can bring fresh ideas, lead the development & operation with getting the peers involved proactively, to join us together in delivering best shopping experiences with high speed and time-to-market. Position Details Understand business requirements, and deliver features with high quality and speed Design, develop, test, and operate new user-facing features for large scale e-commerce systems Build reusable, flexible and perform code and libraries for future use To perform system improvement (e.g. refactoring, adopting appropriate technologies & system architecture, optimizing the JS performance with a proper optimization) Bring new and fresh ideas to the team Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders Mandatory Qualifications: Have good experience in using ReactJS, Redux, Typescript and Jest Proficient understanding of ECMAScript 6  Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3 Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX Desired Qualifications: Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to solve them Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks Experience in building upstream libraries Experience in building management UIs and/or portals Experience in back-end as well in at least 1 programming language Enjoy solving problems in the most efficient way while working in multi-cultural environments Coding as an art more than a tool Improve with the people around you while accepting given legacy system & rules Try to pursue an issue meticulously and not miss a thing with a careful attitude. Better safe than sorry. Not be fixated on ideally solution from technical perspective and come up with a realistic idea to meet business requirement Try to tackle proactively highly challenging issues and manage to get things done. Capacity to convince all stakeholders of choosing the best technical option in long-term and panoramic vision Have good experience in designing and creating good test cases for the code that you are working on Keywords JavaScript/ HTML / CSS / React / Redux / TypeScript / Node JS / AngularJS / Jest / Intern / webpack / Babel / Jenkins / Git / AMP / PWA #engineer #jobcategory02 #frontendengineer #webdeveloper #jobsubcategory19 #commerce #organization01 #RakutenIchiba #servicename01 #Java #programminglanguage02 #JavaScript #programminglanguage07 Languages: English (Overall - 4 - Fluent) In Japanese, Rakuten stands for ‘optimism.’ It means we believe in the future. It’s an understanding that, with the right mind-set, we can make the future better by what we do today. So we challenge ourselves to evolve, innovate and experiment, to create a better, brighter future for everyone. Today, our 70+ businesses span e-commerce, digital content, communications and fintech, bringing the joy of discovery to almost 1.3 billion members across the world. If you have any trouble logging in, please contact us here Rakuten Group, Inc.: rakuten-recruiting-info@mail.rakuten.com *Please read the Application Requirements(EN) / 募集要項(JP) before applying. Our Diversity & Inclusion Policy and Application Documents Rakuten’s corporate mission is to “contribute to society by creating value through innovation and entrepreneurship.” We foster a culture that provides equal opportunities to those who share this founding philosophy and take on the challenge to transform society, regardless of age, gender, nationality, or any other status. Diversity is one of Rakuten's core strategies and a driving force for innovation. Because of this, you are not required to submit any of the following information in order to apply for our job positions. - Gender - Age - Photo - Nationality* - Information not related to business, such as ideological beliefs, family structure, etc. * For legal compliance, we may ask you about your work eligibility
